originalText.text: I was honestly a bit nervous before my appointment with Dr. Alex Vaysman, but as soon as I walked into his office, those jitters faded. The private setting gave me comfort, and the way Dr. Vaysman took his time to really listen and understand my concerns made a world of difference. I didn't feel like just another patient; I felt genuinely cared for. His expertise is evident, not just in his words but in his actions. I left feeling better than I could've imagined. For anyone on the fence, give Dr. Vaysman a visit ‚Äì he's truly one of a kind.

originalText.text: Dr. Vaysman's approach to dermal fillers is truly remarkable. It wasn't just the skillful application, but the genuine conversation and understanding that made me feel at ease. With each appointment, it's clear that they see beyond the surface, valuing the person sitting in front of them. My skin is radiant, but it's the warmth and kindness I experienced that will bring me back. Exceptional care, inside and out!

text.text: Dr. Vaysman's approach to dermal fillers is truly remarkable. It wasn't just the skillful application, but the genuine conversation and understanding that made me feel at ease. With each appointment, it's clear that they see beyond the surface, valuing the person sitting in front of them. My skin is radiant, but it's the warmth and kindness I experienced that will bring me back. Exceptional care, inside and out!

originalText.text: I'm no stranger to injectables, and even still, I also get a little nervous when seeing someone new for the first time. I believe in the importance of trusting your provider and creating a bond with them, and with Dr. Vaysman, that's exactly what I got! I instantly fell in love with him I felt heard by him and so cared for. He could tell I was a little nervous so talked me through the entire process. His calming and friendly demeanor made me feel so comfortable I felt like I could've taken a nap!  Getting treated by him felt like a warm hug and I can't wait for my next treatment with her!! Would recommend him to ANYONE.

originalText.text: Dr. Vaysman transformed my lips with not just skill, but with warmth and genuine care, making the whole experience beautifully personal. The results are fabulous, and the heartfelt approach truly memorable! üëç

originalText.text: I went in for Virtue RF micro needling. A rather uncomfortable procedure, that I volunteered to opt for. What I left from the experience, was the interaction I had with  Dr. Vaysman and aesthetician Regina. He guided me through the process, telling me stories about his experiences. I went away feeling like I spent time with a lovely human being. Cosmetic procedures are not uplifting while they are happening. However, I enjoyed the time I spent with him. He made the whole interaction a good one and left me feeling great with the aftermath results. It is special to find a doctor who you feel genuinely cares about you. Dr. Vaysman made me feel that way.
